CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE - 1983 CODE
This table gives the location within this Code of those sections of the 1983 Code, as updated through May 4, 1988, which are included herein. Sections of the 1983 Code, as supplemented, not listed herein have been omitted as repealed, superseded, obsolete or not of a general and permanent nature. For the location of ordinances adopted subsequent thereto, see the table immediately following this table.
EXPAND
